title: How to Make an Origami Tote Bag

steps.headline: Get a piece of origami paper.
Fold in half on the horizontal axis, to form a triangle.
Fold the top flap of the triangle and make a crease.
Now with left side fold the tip to the crease.
Flip the paper over, on to the back.
Fold in half, bringing the right side to the left.
Now make a slanted cut on top of the tote, this will be the handle.
Fold down the top part of the paper, or the handle.
Flip it over fold the top part again.

text: Get a piece of origami paper.  Fold in half on the horizontal axis, to form a triangle.  Fold the top flap of the triangle and make a crease.  Unfold the crease.  Now with left side fold the tip to the crease.  Repeat with the right side.  Flip the paper over, on to the back.  Fold in half, bringing the right side to the left.  Now make a slanted cut on top of the tote, this will be the handle.  Unfold the paper.  Fold down the top part of the paper, or the handle.  Flip it over fold the top part again.  Now push it out.  Finished.
sentences: Get a piece of origami paper.
Fold in half on the horizontal axis, to form a triangle.
Fold the top flap of the triangle and make a crease.
Now with left side fold the tip to the crease.
Flip the paper over, on to the back.
Fold in half, bringing the right side to the left.
Now make a slanted cut on top of the tote, this will be the handle.
Fold down the top part of the paper, or the handle.
Flip it over fold the top part again.
